title: Fix Menu category banner images for Salad/Soup and remove beer imagery from Drinks visuals

requirements.summary: Update menu category banner image mapping so Salad/Soup categories use appropriate photos and Drinks categories use juice/cold-drink imagery, by adjusting banner image references in frontend/src/content/business.ts only (no item/name/price changes).
acceptanceCriteria: In the Menu UI, the category banner for "Lawazmat (Salads)" displays a salad-related image (not a drinks image).
In the Menu UI, the category banner for "Salad" displays a salad-related image (not a drinks image).
In the Menu UI, the category banner for "Soup" displays a soup-related image (not a drinks image).
In the Menu UI, the category banners for "Hot & Cold Bar" and "Fresh Juice Seasonal" display drinks imagery that represents juice/cold drinks and does not include beer imagery.
No menu item names, descriptions/notes, or prices are modified in `frontend/src/content/business.ts`.

file_operations.description: Update category banner mapping by adding salad/soup entries to categoryBannerImages and switching the category `image` fields for "Lawazmat (Salads)" and "Salad" to use the salad banner, and "Soup" to use the soup banner; keep "Hot & Cold Bar" and "Fresh Juice Seasonal" using the drinks banner. Do not change any menu item names/descriptions/notes/prices.

requirements.summary: Add/replace static generated banner/thumb image assets so all referenced category banners render without broken images and drinks visuals contain no beer imagery.
acceptanceCriteria: New banner image files for Salad and Soup exist under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with the exact filenames referenced by `frontend/src/content/business.ts`.
The existing drinks banner image file used by the drinks categories is updated so it contains no beer imagery and visually matches juice/cold drinks.
No category banner image renders as a broken image icon; if an image fails, the existing `SafeImage` fallback behavior continues to work.

file_operations.description: Add the required Salad category banner photo asset (menu-category-salad.dim_1600x900.jpg) as a static file so category banner references resolve at runtime.
Add the required Soup category banner photo asset (menu-category-soup.dim_1600x900.jpg) as a static file so category banner references resolve at runtime.

Replace/update the existing drinks category banner image to remove any beer imagery and ensure it visually represents juice/cold drinks; keep the filename unchanged so current references continue to work.
Replace/update the existing drinks thumbnail image to remove any beer imagery and ensure it visually represents juice/cold drinks; keep the filename unchanged so current references continue to work.
